mapper.select: select employee_no, dayoff_days as effect_day from employee join dayoff_create_terms dct on trunc(months_between(sysdate,hiredate)/12,0) = year_in_office
mapper.insert: insert into dayoff_create_recode values (#{employee_no}, sysdate, #{effect_day}, #{effect_day} + (select reward_dayoff+previous_dayoff from dayoff_my_recode where employee_no = #{employee_no}),1, #{dayoff_generator})
mapper.update: update dayoff_my_recode set annual_dayoff = #{effect_day} where employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.select: select * from dayoff_create_recode where employee_no = #{employee_no} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(generation_date,'yyyy') order by generation_date asc

select dayoff_no, total_days, da.dayoff_type_code from dayoff_apply da join dayoff_kinds dk on da.dayoff_type_code = dk.dayoff_type_code join document d on da.document_no = d.document_no where (dayoff_deduction = '1' or da.dayoff_type_code = 2) and d.document_state != 3 and da.employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.insert: insert into document values (document_seq.nextval,'휴가신청',(select form_contents from form where form_no = 103),#{employee.employee_no},sysdate,1)
insert into approval values (approval_seq.nextval,(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{employee.employee_no},sysdate,'1',approval_seq.currval+1)
insert into approval values (approval_seq.nextval,(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{employee.employee_no},'','0',approval_seq.currval+1)
insert into approval values (approval_seq.nextval,(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{employee.employee_no},'','0',0)

insert into dayoff_apply values (dayoff_apply_seq.nextval, #{total_days}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{employee.employee_no}, #{dayoff_kind.dayoff_type_code},(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{dayoff_reason} )
insert into dayoff_apply_detail values ((select nvl(max(dayoff_no),1) from dayoff_apply),#{dayoff_day},#{days},#{oneorhalf} )
